name: MASVS-RESILIENCE - MASVS-RESILIENCE-4
description: The app implements anti-dynamic analysis techniques.

rules.note:
It is recommended to implement Anti-Debugging detection mechanisms in the application, if not observed.
Please note that, Multiple detection methods should be implemented so that it cannot be bypassed easily.

It is recommended not to enable the debuggable flag, if observed.
Please note that, the enabled setting allows attackers to obtain access to sensitive information, control the application flow, etc.
